subject: Difference between simracing pedal set
description_text:
Hi,

i have 2 questions, since im interessted in your product:

- what is the difference between your Plus X and Pro X Ultra set?
- When will both be available in germany? Im looking for a 2 pedal set 
with haptics.

Sincerly yours,

Peter

conversations.body_text: Hi PeterShaw,  The ProX Ultra features 16-bit resolution with simultaneous data sampling, offering 8 levels of pressure adjustment and RGB lighting. The PlusX uses 12-bit resolution with a polling-based sampling method. We currently have stock available in our Germany warehouse, ready for shipment.Â
